ClientHandler
This class is responsible for handling the connection to the client.

Abstract class that represents a message from the client to the server
Codex
Class that represents the codex of a player, the board to which the player can add cards
CodexDiffPlacement
This class represent an update for the codex of a player
CodexDiffSetFinalPoints
This class represent the final points gain by each player after the end of the game, and the final scoring calculated with the common and secret objectives.
CodexGUI
This class represents the codex of the player in the GUI
CodexOthers
This class represents the codex of a player that is not the player that is using the GUI.
CodexRenderable
This class is a Renderable that can render the main player's codex.
CodexRenderableOthers
This class is a Renderable that can render the codex of players who are not the main player.
Collectable
Collectable is an interface implemented by all the classes that represent any collectable items in the game.

This class is a multiplier of the points that the player gets from the objective card.
CollectedCollectablesGUI
This class represents the GUI of the collectables that the player has collected so far.
CollectedCollectablesOthers
This class represents the codex of a player that is not the player that is using the GUI.
CommandDisplayRenderable
This class is the renderable that displays the active commands.
CommandObserved
This interface represents an object that can be observed by CommandObservers.
CommandObserver
This interface represents an object that can observe a CommandObserved, that provides a Command Prompt Result as context.
CommandPrompt
This enum represents the possible commands that can be prompted to the user.
CommandPromptResult
This class represents the result of a command prompt.
Configs
This class contains configuration constants for the project.

This class is a Renderable that represents a connect form.

This class is the controller for the connection form SceneBuilder scene.

ConnectionLayerServer
 
ConnectionServerRMI
The class that handles the connection with the client using RMI protocol.
Controller
This class is the controller linked to every client It is used to manage interaction between the player and the server
ControllerHandler
This interface represents an object that provides a controller that can also be set.
ControllerInterface
This interface is used to define the methods that the player can call to interact with the server and the game It extends the Remote and Serializable interface to be used in the RMI protocol
ControllerProvider
This interface represents an object that provides a controller.
CoveredCornersCardPointMultiplier
This class is a GoldCardPointMultiplier that multiplies the points of a GoldCard based on the number of corners covered by other cards
CreateLobbyMsg
Message containing the call of the controller for creating a new lobby and the parameters needed
Deck<Element>
This class represents a deck of elements (cards)
DeckAreaGUI
This class represents the GUI component responsible for housing the decks and the common objectives.
DeckDiff
A wrapper class for each deck diff, the diffs that update the lightDecks
DeckDiffBufferDraw
This class contains the update to the lightModel for showing a new card in the buffer after a draw
DeckDiffDeckDraw
This class contains the update to the lightModel for showing a new backCard in the deck after a draw
DeckGUI
This class represents the GUI component responsible for housing a deck.
DeckRenderable
This class is a Renderable that displays two decks with options to draw cards from them as well as the common objectives.
DecoratedString
This class represents a string that has a style applied to it.
DecorativeCorners
This class is used to create the decorative corners of the cards.
DiagonalCardPointMultiplier
This class is a ObjectiveCardPointMultiplier given by an ObjectiveCard that multiplies the points of a ObjectiveCard based on the number of cards of a certain color disposed in a diagonal line
Differentiable
This interface is used to mark all the classes that can be updated by a ModelDiff
DiffGenerator
This class is used to generate the diffs that are sent to the client to update the lightModel

This class represents a drawable object.
DrawableCard
type of card that can be drawn by the player during the game

This class is a Renderable that represents a draw card form.
DrawMsg
DrawMsg class contain the call to the controller for drawing a card and the parameters of the draw

This class represents the GUI component responsible for housing the end game popup.
EnumProperty<E>
This class represents a property that can be used to bind an Enum to a JavaFX component.

This class erase all the lobbies in the LightLobbyList
FlippableCardGUI
This class represents a card that can be flipped by the player.
FlippablePlayableCard
This class represents a card that can be flipped by the player and that can be placed in the codex

This class is a Renderable that represents a form.
Frontier
Represents the frontier of a codex The frontier is the set of positions that are free and adjacent to a placement
FrontierCardGUI
This class represents the GUI version of the frontier card of a codex.
FrontierDiff
This class represent the list of new Position to add and the list of Position to remove from the frontier after a placement
GadgetGame
This class reset the lightGame removing every diff that was applied to it
Game
This class represents the game as a whole.
GameController
This class is the controller of the game, it manages the game state and the players' actions It is responsible for the game turns logic and the communication between the model and players, and the communication between the model and the persistence layer
GameControllerInterface
This interface is used to define the methods of the game controller used by the user to interact with and modify the game state
GameControllerReceiver
This interface is implemented by classes that need to receive the game controller in order to send commands to it
GameDiff
This class is a wrapper class for all the ModelDiffs of type LightGame, update of the lightGame sent by the server
GameDiffCurrentPlayer
This class contains the update to the lightModel for changing the current player
GameDiffFirstPlayer
This class contains the update to the lightModel for changing the first player (e.g.
GameDiffInitialization
An update that initialize the lightGame for the player who receives the diff.
GameDiffJoin
This class is a container for all the GameDiff that are sent to a player when he joins a game
GameDiffPlayerActivity
This class contains the update to the lightModel for a change in the player activity such as a disconnection or a join
GameDiffPublicObj
This class contains an update to the lightGame that sets the public objectives
GameDiffRemovePlayers
This class contains the update to the lightModel for when players are removed from the game (e.g.
GameDiffSetPawns
This class contains an update to the lightGame that sets all the possible pawn colors options
GameDiffSetPlayerColor
This class contains an update to the lightGame that sets the color of the pawn chosen by a player
GameDiffWinner
This class contains an update to the lightGame that sets the winners of the game
GameList
This interface is implemented by the class that manages the list of games it enables the deletion of a game from the list of active games
GameListRenderable
This class is a Renderable that represents a list of games.
GameParty
This class is used to manage the players in the game
GamePartyDiff
A wrapper class for each gamePartyDiff, the diff that update the lightGameParty
GameScene
The scene that contains the game board and all the other elements of the game

This enum represents the possible states of the game.

The main class of the GUI.

Hand
The class constructor
HandDiff
This abstract class represents an update for the lightGame that updates the lightHand of user (the owner of the view)
HandDiffAdd
This class represents an update for the lightGame that adds a card to the lightHand of the user
HandDiffAddOneSecretObjectiveOption
This diff is an update that adds a secret objective option to the hand of a player.
HandDiffRemove
This class represents an update for the lightGame that removes a card from the lightHand of the user
HandDiffSetObj
This class represents an update for the lightGame that adds the chosen secret objective to the hand of the user This card doesn't increase the number of cards in the hand
HandDiffUpdatePlayability
This class represents an update for the lightGame that updates the playability of a card in the hand of the user
HandGUI
This class represents the GUI component responsible for housing the hand of the player and the secret objective.
HandOtherDiff
This abstract class represents an update for the lightGame that updates the lightHand of another player
HandOtherDiffAdd
This class represents an update for the lightGame that adds a card to the lightHand of another player
HandOtherDiffRemove
This class represents an update for the lightGame that removes a card from the lightHand of another player
HandOthersGUI
This class represents the GUI component to show the hand of a player that is not the player that is using the GUI.

This class is a Renderable that can render the hand of players who are not the main player.

This class is a Renderable that can render the hand of the main player.

This class is used to convert Object present in the Model to the corresponding LightObject present in the LightModel so that a client can only have the information it needs to display the game

This class is used to represent a lobby in the game.
LobbyController
This class is the controller of the lobby, it manages the players that are in the lobby (join and leave) and is responsible for starting the game.
LobbyControllerGUI
This class is the controller for the lobby SceneBuilder scene.
LobbyControllerInterface
Interface that defines the methods that a lobby controller should implement in order to manage the addition and removal players in the lobby and start the game
LobbyDiff
This class is a wrapper for all the ModelDiffs of type LightLobby, objects that are used to update the LightLobby of the client
LobbyDiffEdit
This class represent an updated to the LightLobby of the client containing the nicknames of players who are joining and leaving it for a user who is already in the lobby
LobbyDiffEditLogin
This class represent an updated to the LightLobby of the client containing the nicknames of players who are joining and leaving it for a user who is joining the lobby
